ghost.name: Astonish
ghost.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

ghost.name: Astral Barrage
ghost.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents.

ghost.name: Confuse Ray
ghost.effect: Confuses the target.

ghost.name: Curse
ghost.effect: If the user is a Ghost-type, it sacrifices half of its max HP to place a curse on the target. The cursed Pokémon loses 1/4 of its max HP at the end of each round. If not a Ghost-type, it lowers the user's Dexterity by 1 and raises its Strength and Defense by 1.

ghost.name: Destiny Bond
ghost.effect: If the user faints this round, the Pokémon that knocked it out also faints.

ghost.name: Grudge
ghost.effect: If the user faints this round, the move that knocked it out has its PP reduced to 0.

ghost.name: Hex
ghost.effect: If the target has a status ailment, this move's damage is doubled.

ghost.name: Infernal Parade
ghost.effect: If the target has a status ailment, this move's damage is doubled. Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

ghost.name: Lick
ghost.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

ghost.name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
ghost.effect: Z-Move. Ignores the target's Ability.

ghost.name: Moongeist Beam
ghost.effect: Ignores the target's Ability.

ghost.name: Never-Ending Nightmare
ghost.effect: Z-Move. Base power and category depend on the original move.

ghost.name: Night Shade
ghost.effect: This move always deals damage equal to the user's level (or Rank * 10).

ghost.name: Nightmare
ghost.effect: A sleeping target loses 1/4 of its max HP at the end of each round.

ghost.name: Ominous Wind
ghost.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, all of the user's stats are raised by 1.

ghost.name: Phantom Force
ghost.effect: The user vanishes on the first turn, becoming invulnerable. On the second turn, it attacks. This move hits even if the target is using Protect or Detect.

ghost.name: Poltergeist
ghost.effect: This move fails if the target is not holding an item.

ghost.name: Rage Fist
ghost.effect: This move's damage increases by +1 for each time the user has been hit in this battle.

ghost.name: Shadow Ball
ghost.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Special Defense is lowered by 1.

ghost.name: Shadow Bone
ghost.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Defense is lowered by 1.

ghost.name: Shadow Claw
ghost.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio.

ghost.name: Shadow Force
ghost.effect: The user vanishes on the first turn, becoming invulnerable. On the second turn, it attacks. This move hits even if the target is using Protect or Detect.

ghost.name: Shadow Punch
ghost.effect: This move never misses.

ghost.name: Shadow Sneak
ghost.effect: Priority.

ghost.name: Sinister Arrow Raid

ghost.name: Spectral Thief
ghost.effect: The user steals the target's stat boosts before attacking.

ghost.name: Spirit Shackle
ghost.effect: The target is trapped and cannot switch out.

ghost.name: Spite
ghost.effect: The last move the target used has its PP reduced by 4.

ghost.name: Trick-or-Treat
ghost.effect: Adds the Ghost type to the target's current typing.

ice.name: Aurora Beam
